properties.name: static-data.root-dir
properties.description: Relative path to the folder where all static data is stored. The folder should be located next to the project itself. Use System.getProperty("user.dir"); to find out the project directory.

properties.name: static-data.root-url
properties.description: Root url of static data. Used to create a url for images and other static data by concatenating root url and static file's path.
